Brandon Dorn

Information Architecture & Interaction Design

I’m a designer living in Chapel Hill, NC, with my wife, BethAnne. I work on digital products at Viget Labs, where my daily task is to help others make sense of things through considered design.

  • Email is the best way to reach me.
  • Meaning & Form is a blog about user experience design.
  • Abundance is a blog about everything else.

Here's a quote that inspired me recently, which you may like:

Touch a limit of your understanding and it falls away, to reveal mystery upon mystery.

–Marilynne Robinson, The Givenness of Things
